TopicTitle: Looking for someone who likes to do texturing work

Articles.Content:
I\'m currently reworking my Starfighter mod, changing the design a bit and taking advantage of the MuMech series of plugins(by the always awesome r4m0n) and found my lynchpin: I suck at texturing and I don\'t like doing the work.

Anyone out there who likes doing it? I would offer my skills at modelling, UV mapping(and very limited coding abilities) in exchange for the work and full credit of course.

Any takers?

I\'d be willing to help with texturing if you\'d like? I\'ve got some of my recent Kerbal type with in this thread over here:

http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=10594.0

I do stuff in both Zbrush and Photoshop if that makes and difference, and one upside is that I usually can generate normal/spec/AO maps from my Zbrush sculpts if you want them.
